title: Tesla $20 Billion Investment : A Bold Move Towards Autonomous Vehicles and Robotics , ETAuto
description: Tesla Capital Spending: Tesla plans to more than double its capital spending to over $20 billion, shifting focus from electric vehicles to ambitious projects in autonomous driving and humanoid robotics, as CEO Elon Musk emphasizes a transformative business model., Tesla Capital Spending: Tesla plans to more than double its capital spending to over $20 billion, shifting focus from electric vehicles to ambitious projects in autonomous driving and humanoid robotics, as CEO Elon Musk emphasizes a transformative business model.

# Tesla plans $20 bn capital spending spree in push beyond human-driven cars

Tesla is still reliant on human-driven EVs for most of its sales, ‌but its valuation ‍far exceeds any other automaker, putting it more in league with major tech companies.
